text: Cottrell James Hunter III (December 14, 1968 â€“ November 28, 2021) was an American shot putter and coach. He was the 1999 World Champion. He was best known for his role in the BALCO scandal. He was also married to sprinter Marion Jones. Hunter died on November 29, 2021, at the age of 52. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American track and field athletes Category:Shot putters Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C.
title: C. J. Hunter
